table.name: The archer is looking to...
table.value: Help his allies slaughter the enemy
Keep safe someone special in the castle
Hear word of any percolating wars

table.name: The archer carries
table.value: A longbow with a fraying string
A longbow crafted of superior wood
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild eagle
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild hawk
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild owl
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild pheasant
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild raven
Arrows fletched with the feathers of a wild swan
